Text: followupBen Hello It was good speaking with you earlier Thank you for the time I wanted to send you an email with my contact information so we can stay in touch over time At some point it will make sense to look outside you current employer for your next career move and I hope you will consider me for assistance Also if you come across anyone that could utilize my services please refer them to me We do offer a referral bonus for accounting and tax professionals that are hired by our clients Thank you in advance for doing so John John Garcia Partner Global Search Consulting x x fax The information contained in this transmission is client privileged andor confidential information intended for the use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited
